评论详情: I ordered this outfit using my gift card balance, on Sunday,12/29& received them Monday evening! Fast! Next, i love the color(navy) the texture of the material, well made, and the size XL is perfect. Well, a little snug in the middle, but that's because of my body shape. They ate Warm, comfortable, and stylish! I love them, & recommend the sweatsuit 2 piece, to everyone. Well worth the extra money, fir the quality. It's nice, not cheaply made!
So comfy.  5'5" 220#  ordered XXL. Ordered navy blue in XL and too snug.  Returned and ordered XXL in gray. Nice color and fit.  I would say they run small by one size.

评论用户: Good product easy to assemble but read the directions.
评论详情: Love the soft feel and fit. The pants run a bit big. I wear 14/16. The large fits great  i have no ass lol and thin legs but my upper body is wear I face problems. Bottoms are to big and the tops are to small.

I am going to buy a few more in different colors. This is the perfect lounge around home/run weekend errands/sleep tracksuit. They’re soft, fit well, look nice and while not SUPER warm, are warm enough to wear as is under a winter coat when going out in 32f weather. Highly recommend. I’m 5’3, 160 and got M. Perfect fit for me. Roomy but not loose.
The color and fit were good…

Casual, comfortable and stylish.  Could wear it to run errands.  Sweat suit fabric but very light and soft. Haven't washed it yet so don't know if it will pill. Only thing I don't really like is the white stripe on the legs.  Would prefer it w/o but not a deal breaker.

Bought these in 3x for day after wedding brunch. I knew I'd be really tired & wanted a comfy, trendy, nice looking set. This set did not disappoint! It's cozy and warm for a fall morning but comfy enough to wear all day as weather in NY started heating up a bit throughout the day. (I usually get hot and change clothes as weather changes) This set took me through the entire day! I was totally impressed. I have not washed it yet so fingers crossed that it washes well as this is one of my top faves! The top isn't crazy over sized (like most my stuff) and the pants were a bit long on my 5 ft 3" frame. But that's always the case for me. I have to get used to elastic at ankle which isn't my fav but trendy now. I usually just roll pants up at the waste. Once you wash them, they usually shorten a bit. No weird smell at all. I Highly recommend this set! Buying in more colors!

Super comfy and cute! I love being able to run errands in it and not look frumpy. It doesn’t wash well after a few wears and will start to pill up in some areas but for the cost, it’s worthwhile for a quick outfit.

This sweatsuit is very comfortable. I ordered the black and the navy. The material is not thick for this time of the year (January and 27 degrees) but I wore thermals underneath and I was fine. Amazon recommended an XL but I got a large instead and I'm glad. XL would have been too baggy. I wanted a closer fit but not tight. That's what I have in a size L. I got it on sale so the price is higher now, but I'll keep my eye on it to buy another color because I really like it. I work from home and it's perfect.

I purchased the grey set for traveling and it did the job but it’s not 100% what I was looking for long term. The material feels a little heavy, stiff and has zero stretch. So is it cute? Yes but I try to keep a small closet and want all my pieces to be great. This outfit is cute but just okay in the comfort area.
Shirt runs smaller for those with larger tummy. Pants wear true to size

I’m going to order more!!! I LOVE THIS OUTIFT… it’s well made, true to size (finally something that fits my curves and hips and waist), soft, comfy, warm, and I just want to cuddle down and never get out of these.

Ok...I was skeptical. I don't leave many reviews. When I do, I really love an item, or I'm very upset. I absolutely LOVE this suit! If you're worried that the material is thin & cheap, think again! This is NOT see through. This is definitely well made. It is warm & so comfy. I'm fairly lucky because I will be able to wear this to work. So much cuter that the normal suit that is more like hanes or fruit of the loom. Don't get me wrong I still love those because their color wheel has definitely changed and I wear the Men's suits from those brands. But this baddie is definitely something that I won't feel like Rocky Balboas sister in. I want the khaki color really bad. For reference I'm 5'3" 205lbs. It is a little long. But I love all of my sweats BIG & COMFY. I'm not sure how this will wash. I will hang dry or Air dry in dryer. However, I will prior to wearing. I hope this helps all.

Very happy with this purchase. The pants are a bit long but I’m only 5’3”. I rolled a cuff in the pants and they are fine. Based on other reviews I’m assuming they’ll shrink after I wash them anyway. It fits true to size. I wanted something to wear on lazy days this is perfect. Update: washed fine in cool water no shrinking. However, I find the neck line really annoying. It rubs on my neck, it’s kinda high. I can’t stand anything tight or too high on my neck. I had to redo the neckline to wear it comfortably.

This is a very comfortable set, and around the house I don’t really care whether it’s flattering or not, tbh. I wouldn’t wear it out and about, though, because the pants are so long! They don’t taper in, either, so you just end up having this wide blouson effect around your ankles because you can’t see the cuff at the ankles, seeing as how they’re covered up by all the extra material. That was redundant on purpose because it’s worth stressing lol. And I’m 5’7”, so it’s not like I’m super short. While the material is soft enough, it’s not super soft and snuggly. The top is plenty long for tucking in. If it were softer, I’d be reaching for it all the time as a layering piece because I love the color.
These are so comfortable and trendy. The only this is to wash inside out because of the white stripes. I was able to get my size and it fits great. It's also lightweight.

Looked just like the photos and the material was a good weight and quality.  I didn't like the jogger part of the pants.  It was not snug enough for a "jogger" type of look.  I like a more true jogger style..not just the elastic band at the bottom.  I returned this one.  If it had been true jogger style I would find it a bit more flattering.
